caption.title: Induction of type I IFN expression in monocytes requires virus infection.
caption.p: (A-B) Enriched WT bone marrow monocytes were co-cultured with Vero cells infected with RRV-GFP (n = 3/group). After 18 h of co-culture, GFP expression in Vero cells and monocytes was measured by flow cytometry. (A) Shown are representative histograms. (B) The percent GFP + monocytes and Vero cells. Data are representative of two independent experiments. (C-D) Enriched WT bone marrow monocytes were co-cultured with uninfected or RRV-GFP-infected Vero cells in the presence or absence of 1 μM Latrunculin B. After 18 h of co-culture, (C) IFNα2 mRNA expression level in monocytes was quantified by qRT-PCR. Data are normalized to 18S rRNA levels and are expressed as the relative expression ( n-fold increase) over expression in uninfected Vero cells without monocytes. (D) The percent GFP + Vero cells and monocytes were measured by flow cytometry based on GFP expression within the CD45 - Vero cells and the CD45 + monocytes. Data are combined from two independent experiments. P values were determined by one-way ANOVA with a Tukey’s multiple comparison test.
